snippet: Can I'll Have Another become the first Triple Crown winner since Affirmed in 1978? The Rail's Melissa Hoppert thinks so, but her Times colleague Victor Mather thinks this will not be the year.
abstract: Can I'll Have Another become the first Triple Crown winner since Affirmed in 1978? The Rail's Melissa Hoppert thinks so, but her Times colleague Victor Mather thinks this will not be the year.

headline.main: Belmont Video Debate: The Romantic vs. The Railbird
